mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAKE_GRASS (NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, LEARN_TIME, ENROLL_DATE, DELETE_YN, MODIFY_DATE, HIT) VALUES (SEQ_MAKE_GRASS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{learnTime}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, '0')
mapper.select: SELECT G.NO, G.TITLE, TO_CHAR(G.CONTENT) CONTENT, G.LEARN_TIME, TO_CHAR(CAST(G.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, G.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT FROM MAKE_GRASS G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.WRITER = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT MG_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM MG_CMT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MG_NO) C ON G.NO = C.MG_NO WHERE G.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY G.NO DESC
SELECT M.IMG_PATH, M.NICK, COUNT(G.NO) CNT FROM MAKE_GRASS G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.WRITER = M.NO GROUP BY (M.NICK, M.IMG_PATH) ORDER BY CNT DESC FETCH NEXT 7 ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.NO, M.NICK AS WRITER, A.TITLE, A.LEARN_TIME, TO_CHAR(A.CONTENT) CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CAST(A.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, A.HIT, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES, NVL(HATES,0) HATES FROM MAKE_GRASS A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT MG_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM MG_CMT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MG_NO) C ON A.NO = C.MG_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT MG_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM MG_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY MG_NO) L ON A.NO = L.MG_NO WHERE A.NO = #{ano}

SELECT G.NO, G.TITLE, TO_CHAR(G.CONTENT) CONTENT, G.LEARN_TIME, TO_CHAR(CAST(G.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, G.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER FROM MAKE_GRASS G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.WRITER = M.NO WHERE G.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND G.WRITER = #{no} ORDER BY G.NO DESC
